lead_paragraph: The automaker said it planned to strengthen its balance sheet by using cash instead of stock to reduce its $34 billion debt load.
snippet: The automaker said it planned to strengthen its balance sheet by using cash instead of stock to reduce its $34 billion debt load.

headline.main: Ford to Repay $4 Billion Debt, With Eye on Share Value and Further Recovery
headline.seo: Ford to Repay $4 Billion in Debt
headline.print_headline: Ford to Repay $4 Billion Debt, With Eye on Share Value and Further Recovery
